title: Tab Completion
content:
Why it matters

Tab completion reduces typing and prevents mistakes by completing commands, paths, and options.

How to use

  • Type part of a command or path, press Tab
  • If ambiguous, press Tab twice to list possibilities (shell-dependent)

Practice

mkdir -p ~/unix-cli-practice/completion-demo
cd ~/unix-cli-practice/completion-demo
touch alpha.txt alps.txt beta.txt
ls a<Tab>
